title: GYMs & Wellness - New In Abu Dhabi

content.text: GYMs & Wellness

Complete guide to Abu Dhabi gyms, fitness centers, spas and wellness facilities. Find budget-friendly options, ladies-only gyms, luxury spas, and specialized fitness studios with current pricing and practical details.
Abu Dhabi Gym Membership Prices 2025
Budget Gyms: AED 200-450 per month
Premium Gyms: AED 500-900 per month
Luxury Hotel Gyms: AED 1,000+ per month
Drop-in Classes: AED 80-150 per session
Day Passes: AED 50-150 per day
Last updated: August 2025

Operating Hours: 24/7

Parking: Free at mall locations
Trial: Free trial available online
Payment: Monthly, no long-term contract required
Contact: Check GymNation website for current promotions

Tips for Choosing Abu Dhabi Gyms
Before Signing Up
Take advantage of free trials – Most gyms offer trial sessions
Compare annual vs monthly rates – Significant savings with longer commitments
Check ladies-only options if required
Consider location and parking – Traffic and convenience matter
Ask about corporate discounts – Many employers have partnerships
Questions to Ask
What’s included in membership price?
Are there additional fees for classes or facilities?
What are peak hours and crowding levels?
Is personal training available and at what cost?
What are the cancellation policies?
Money-Saving Tips
Look for seasonal promotions (Valentine’s, summer, New Year)
Ask about family or couple packages
Check if your health insurance offers gym reimbursements
Consider pay-per-class options if you prefer flexibility
Abu Dhabi Fitness Class Costs

Group Fitness Classes: Usually included with gym membership
Specialized Classes (CrossFit, Boxing): AED 80-150 per session
Personal Training: AED 200-500 per hour
Yoga Classes: AED 60-120 per session
Spinning Classes: AED 80-130 per session
Wellness Services Pricing Guide
Basic Massage (60 min): AED 150-400
Luxury Spa Treatments: AED 500-1,200
Physiotherapy Session: AED 200-400
Facial Treatments: AED 200-600
Body Scrub/Wrap: AED 250-500
This guide is updated regularly. Prices and availability may change. Always confirm current rates and offers directly with facilities.
